text: aur tu unhe dekhega ke wo (jahannam ke) saamne la khade kiye jayenge, maare zillath ke jhuke ja rahe honge aur kin ankhiyo se dekh rahe honge, imaan waale saaf kahenge ke haqiqi ziyaa kaar1 wo hai jinhone aaj qayaamath ke din apne aap ko aur apne ghar waalo ko nuqsaan mein daal diya, yaad rakho ke yaqinan zaalim log dayimi azaab mein hai
